participants.title: Participants
participants.intro: Ready to join Moncton's inaugural civic tech hackathon?
participants.registration: Registration opens soon! Sign up for our mailing list to be notified when registration goes live and receive event updates:
participants.faqLink: Check our FAQ page for answers to common questions.

sponsors.title: Sponsors
sponsors.description: Your sponsorship supports civic innovation and connects you with emerging tech talent while addressing critical community challenges.
sponsors.meeting: We're happy to meet in person or by video call to discuss sponsorship opportunities and create custom packages.

media.title: Media Inquiries
media.info: We're happy to provide additional information, arrange interviews with organizers, or discuss media partnerships.

general.title: General Questions
general.intro: For any other questions about Hack4Change:

stayConnected.title: Stay Connected
stayConnected.intro: Join our mailing list to receive event updates:
stayConnected.description: Never miss important announcements about registration, sponsors, prizes, or event details.
